languages.text: {n}Вашему взору предстает скорчившийся в агонии эльдар — вернее, нечто, напоминающее эльдара. Его лицо иссечено десятками шрамов и швов, суставы двигаются под кожей с тошнотворной неправильностью, а с лица взирает лишь одно безумное око. Однако в его изодранных одеяниях с трудом узнаются церемониальные робы провидца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вашему взору предстает скорчившийся в агонии эльдар. В его изодранных одеяниях с трудом узнаются церемониальные робы фарсира. Его кожа обветрена и бледна — набухшие от напряжения вены просвечивают скозь нее словно через пергамент. С великим трудом он приподнимает голову и смотрит на вас выпученными глазами, из уголков которых стекают струйки крови.{/n}
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: {n}You see a contorted, agony-racked Aeldari — or, more accurately, something that resembles one. Dozens of scars and sutures cover its face, the sight of its misaligned joints moving under its skin makes your stomach turn, and its singular eye looks devoid of sanity. And yet, as you examine the creature's tattered clothes, you can still recognise, albeit with some difficulty, the ceremonial raiment of a Farseer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вашему взору предстает скорчившийся в агонии эльдар — вернее, нечто, напоминающее эльдара. Его лицо иссечено десятками шрамов и швов, суставы двигаются под кожей с тошнотворной неправильностью, а с лица взирает лишь одно безумное око. Однако в его изодранных одеяниях с трудом узнаются церемониальные робы провидца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You see a contorted, agony-racked Aeldari — or, more accurately, something that resembles one. And yet, as you examine the creature's tattered clothes, you can still recognise, albeit with some difficulty, the ceremonial raiment of a Farseer.{/n}

Dozens of scars and sutures cover its face, the sight of its misaligned joints moving under its skin makes your stomach turn, and its singular eye looks devoid of sanity. And yet, as you examine the creature's tattered clothes, you can still recognise, albeit with some difficulty, the ceremonial raiment of a Farseer.{/n}
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: {n}你看到了一个痛苦不堪、身型扭曲的艾达灵族，或者更准确地说，是某个类似于艾达灵族的东西。它的脸上布满了疤痕和缝线，关节在皮肤下面滑动，令你感到恶心，唯一的眼睛看起来也没有任何理性可言。不过，当你仔细观察这只生物破烂的衣服时，你依然勉强辨认出，它身上穿着艾达灵族先知的衣服。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see a contorted, agony-racked Aeldari — or, more accurately, something that resembles one. Dozens of scars and sutures cover its face, the sight of its misaligned joints moving under its skin makes your stomach turn, and its singular eye looks devoid of sanity. And yet, as you examine the creature's tattered clothes, you can still recognise, albeit with some difficulty, the ceremonial raiment of a Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你看到了一个痛苦不堪、身型扭曲的艾达灵族，或者更准确地说，是某个类似于艾达灵族的东西。它的脸上布满了疤痕和缝线，关节在皮肤下面滑动，令你感到恶心，唯一的眼睛看起来也没有任何理性可言。不过，当你仔细观察这只生物破烂的衣服时，你依然勉强辨认出，它身上穿着艾达灵族先知的衣服。{/n}
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: {n}Ves a un Aeldari contorsionado y agónico... o, mejor dicho, algo que podría ser un Aeldari. Su rostro está cubierto de cicatrices y suturas, el movimiento de sus articulaciones desalineadas te provoca náuseas y su único ojo parece haber perdido toda cordura. No obstante, mientras examinas las ropas ajadas de la criatura, aún puedes reconocer, no sin dificultad, la vestimenta ceremonial de un vidente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see a contorted, agony-racked Aeldari — or, more accurately, something that resembles one. Dozens of scars and sutures cover its face, the sight of its misaligned joints moving under its skin makes your stomach turn, and its singular eye looks devoid of sanity. And yet, as you examine the creature's tattered clothes, you can still recognise, albeit with some difficulty, the ceremonial raiment of a Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves a un Aeldari contorsionado y agónico... o, mejor dicho, algo que podría ser un Aeldari. Su rostro está cubierto de cicatrices y suturas, el movimiento de sus articulaciones desalineadas te provoca náuseas y su único ojo parece haber perdido toda cordura. No obstante, mientras examinas las ropas ajadas de la criatura, aún puedes reconocer, no sin dificultad, la vestimenta ceremonial de un vidente.{/n}
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: {n}Du siehst einen verzerrten, von Qualen gepeinigten Aeldari — oder besser gesagt etwas, was einem Aeldari ähnelt. Dutzende von Narben und Nähten bedecken sein Gesicht, der Anblick seiner verschobenen Gelenke, die sich unter seiner Haut bewegen, bereitet dir Übelkeit, und sein einziges Auge wirkt vollkommen wahnsinnig. Und doch: Als du die zerschlissene Kleidung der Kreatur ansiehst, erkennst du mit einiger Mühe noch das zeremonielle Gewand eines Runenpropheten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see a contorted, agony-racked Aeldari — or, more accurately, something that resembles one. Dozens of scars and sutures cover its face, the sight of its misaligned joints moving under its skin makes your stomach turn, and its singular eye looks devoid of sanity. And yet, as you examine the creature's tattered clothes, you can still recognise, albeit with some difficulty, the ceremonial raiment of a Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst einen verzerrten, von Qualen gepeinigten Aeldari — oder besser gesagt etwas, was einem Aeldari ähnelt. Dutzende von Narben und Nähten bedecken sein Gesicht, der Anblick seiner verschobenen Gelenke, die sich unter seiner Haut bewegen, bereitet dir Übelkeit, und sein einziges Auge wirkt vollkommen wahnsinnig. Und doch: Als du die zerschlissene Kleidung der Kreatur ansiehst, erkennst du mit einiger Mühe noch das zeremonielle Gewand eines Runenpropheten.{/n}
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: {n}あなたが目にしたのは、苦痛に打ちひしがれて歪んだ形相のアエルダリ…正確にはそれを思わせるものだった。その顔は何十もの傷跡と縫い目に覆われており、ずれた関節が皮膚の下で動いているという、見ていて胃の痛くなるような状態になっている。一重の目も正気を失っているようだ。それでもその者のボロボロの服を調べてみると、多少見分けがたくはあるが、先見司の儀式用の衣服であることがわかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see a contorted, agony-racked Aeldari — or, more accurately, something that resembles one. Dozens of scars and sutures cover its face, the sight of its misaligned joints moving under its skin makes your stomach turn, and its singular eye looks devoid of sanity. And yet, as you examine the creature's tattered clothes, you can still recognise, albeit with some difficulty, the ceremonial raiment of a Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが目にしたのは、苦痛に打ちひしがれて歪んだ形相のアエルダリ…正確にはそれを思わせるものだった。その顔は何十もの傷跡と縫い目に覆われており、ずれた関節が皮膚の下で動いているという、見ていて胃の痛くなるような状態になっている。一重の目も正気を失っているようだ。それでもその者のボロボロの服を調べてみると、多少見分けがたくはあるが、先見司の儀式用の衣服であることがわかった。{/n}
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: {n}Vous découvrez un Aeldari tordu par les affres d'une douleur insoutenable... ou plus précisément une créature qui y ressemble. Son visage est balafré de dizaines de cicatrices et émaillé de points de suture, les articulations difformes qui s'agitent sous sa peau vous soulèvent l'estomac et son œil étrange semble dépourvu de toute raison. Et pourtant, en examinant plus attentivement ses vêtements déchirés, vous parvenez à reconnaître, non sans mal, la tenue cérémonielle d'un Grand Prophète.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see a contorted, agony-racked Aeldari — or, more accurately, something that resembles one. Dozens of scars and sutures cover its face, the sight of its misaligned joints moving under its skin makes your stomach turn, and its singular eye looks devoid of sanity. And yet, as you examine the creature's tattered clothes, you can still recognise, albeit with some difficulty, the ceremonial raiment of a Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous découvrez un Aeldari tordu par les affres d'une douleur insoutenable... ou plus précisément une créature qui y ressemble. Son visage est balafré de dizaines de cicatrices et émaillé de points de suture, les articulations difformes qui s'agitent sous sa peau vous soulèvent l'estomac et son œil étrange semble dépourvu de toute raison. Et pourtant, en examinant plus attentivement ses vêtements déchirés, vous parvenez à reconnaître, non sans mal, la tenue cérémonielle d'un Grand Prophète.{/n}
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: {n}Çarpılmış, acıyla kıvranan bir Aeldari... Daha doğrusu ona benzer bir şey görüyorsun. Yüzünde onlarca yara ve dikiş izi bulunuyor, derisinin altındaki oturmamış eklemlerin görüntüsü mideni bulandırıyor, tek gözü ise mantıktan yoksunca bakıyor. Gelgelelim yaratığın yırtık kıyafetlerini incelerken zor da olsa Ötesezenlerin tören giysisini tanıyabiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see a contorted, agony-racked Aeldari — or, more accurately, something that resembles one. Dozens of scars and sutures cover its face, the sight of its misaligned joints moving under its skin makes your stomach turn, and its singular eye looks devoid of sanity. And yet, as you examine the creature's tattered clothes, you can still recognise, albeit with some difficulty, the ceremonial raiment of a Farseer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Çarpılmış, acıyla kıvranan Aeldari'yi görüyorsun.Daha doğrusu ona benzer bir şey görüyorsun. Düzinelerce yara ve dikiş izi yüzünü kaplıyor, derisinin altındaki oturmamış eklemlerin görüntüsü mideni bulandırıyor ve tek gözü ise mantıktan yoksunmuş gibi bakıyor. Yine de yaratığın yırtık kıyafetlerini incelerken zor da olsa Ötesezenlerin tören kıyafetini tanıyabiliyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer
